title: pArthasArathi parama dayAnidhi
sahitya:
pArthasArathi parama dayAnidhi yadupati paNNUru kuzhalUdum 
shenkarat-tAmarai tanilIriru pari shUDiya puri shUDiya marai vIdiyil naTamADiya


anupallavi

  ArttE Ezhum shamara bhUmi arjunan tEr amarum svAmi 
kIrti bhagavad gItai pughalum krSNa gOpAla svAmi


caraNam    annaik0kayirukku ATpaTTAn adanaiyuminji urugumuLam pAncAlik-kazhuttiloru 
aNi mAngalyam tanaik-kAttiDa arum pADugaL paTTAn pinnaiyum maTroru pEccumuNDO pErALA unaiyanri 
gati vEru uNDO shonna kurumozhi poippadum uNDO suka nAradamuni tumburu tudi pADuDu gati nADiDu
